Package com.whirlycott.cache

The main Whirlycache package contains the main interfaces and system components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Cache Defines a simple interface that all caches should implement.
Cacheable This is an optional interface for object keys which may be stored in the cache.
CacheMaintenancePolicy This interface defines the operations in a cache maintenance policy.
ManagedCache This is the interface that all backend caching systems must implement.
 

Class Summary
CacheConfiguration Represents the configuration for an individual Cache object.
CacheDecorator Owns the cache tuning thread and provides housekeeping facilities for ManagedCache implementations.
CacheManager The CacheManager manages caches by creating and deleting them.
Constants Serves to encapsulate several constant values.
Item Wraps an item in the cache and records some information about when it was last used, added, etc.
Messages Utility class for getting access to internationalized log messages.
RecordKeeper Encapsulates runtime stats for a Cache.
 

Exception Summary
CacheException Gets thrown when problems occur with the Whirlycache.
 

Package com.whirlycott.cache Description

The main Whirlycache package contains the main interfaces and system components.
